title: Golden Angel, Unwilling Sex Slave 1: The Abduction of Number Seven
description: "Attention-Grabbing, As Well As Hot Reading!" writes Sarah Silversmith of The Romance Reader's Connection. The Abduction of Subject Seven is the first of the five installments of Claire Thompson's The Golden Angel- Unwilling Sex Slave series. A young woman is abducted into a sex slave ring, where she is renamed "Number Seven" and forced to submit to sexual bondage at the hands of her cruel captors. But this is only the first step in Number Seven's dangerous journey of sexual submission and awakening. A Sizzler Editions Hot-Flashes novelette.
author: Claire Thompson
